name: Joe Gibbs Politz
content: Joe Gibbs Politz - JOE GIBBS POLITZ Associate Professor of TeachingUC San Diego CSE Contact Brian W. Kernigan on programming: "Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not smart enough to debug it." (Click for more wisdom) Courses Many of my course offerings are designed with reusable materials, including videos, notes, and starter code for assignments. Feel free to check them out, and get in touch if you have questions or find them helpful. Pyret is a functional scripting language designed for programming education. Bootstrap builds and does professional development for curricula that integrate computing into middle- and high-school courses. Several Bootstrap curricula use Pyret.
